name: Don't Hate Me Cause I'm Beautiful
name_original: Don't Hate Me Cause I'm Beautiful
description:
A Nanbaka horror game set in an AU. This is a demo.

A killer is on the loose, targeting the prettiest faces he knows. Who is the killer? Who will fall prey to him first? Who will survive? Will Hajime show up in time to save anyone, or will he be too late?

Project in progress.
